reviews.review_msg: I really don't want to seem biased because he gave me a bad mark but I genuinely think he is a terrible professor. He's very unpredictable as you don't know what to expect on exams...at all. His marking seems unfair and my final mark just didn't seem to add up. I just don't think he is professional at what he does.

Very entertaining teaching style, e.g. uses accents to illustrate phonetic concepts. Encourages engagement in phonetic practice, especially from those with non-English backgrounds (I wish they weren't always so shy!) Generous marker, easy assignments, fair exams, and a great guy to chat with. I highly recommend him if yr into phonetics/phonology.
he's awesome! he lets you stalk him at home hahaha.ps he gave me his number ;)

Experienced phonetician,BUT certainly NOT a good teacher.Sytle:funny but pointless,unhelpful.Lecture:Poorly organized and mostly not correlated with the exams. Personality: Always pick favorites(too obvious)He is the worst ling prof because he scaled students according to his own impression.He doesn't "teach", you have to find the answers yourself!

Entertaining and interesting lectures, but if you want to do well in this class you've got to be highly self-motivated, cause it's -tough-.  There's a lot of stuff on exams that he only mentioned in passing, so you've got to be paying very close attention.

I thought he was an easy marker. He gives part marks for answers that are somewhat related to the correct answer. The midterms were all straight from his lectures.  If you attend all his lectures, you'll be fine. He does pick favorites, but it's not too bad. He won't take marks off from those who isn't one of his favorites.

omg, seriously avoid him at all cost. His markings are extremely hard...he put questions on the quizzes and exams that are not even related to what we're suppose to study or learn.  Not to mention, whenever you try to ask him a question during lecture...most of the time you'll end up with the answer "Huh, wtf did he just said?"
No Comments
In all my years at SFU, I have never disliked any professor other than him.  Bad teaching. Bad organization.  Bad attitude towards students.. Avoid at all cost.

He is one of the best prof, he is really interested in languages and the different sounds that people can produce,  I really loved his class. the exams are not easy, u have to understand his lecture, not to memorize everything in the book.
No Comments
...he's freaken unorganized...says he'll return out quiz's b4 the MT...never returned them...he doesn't know and or remember what he says or teaches during lec...

he's simply not good in teaching.he surely discourages people.of course, he doesn't know the material, therefore he can't explain it well.his questions from exams are awfully hard and confusing.he ONLY likes those students that he favors.worst and very first prof that i have taken class with.

Don't take a class from him if u don't need to. As many had said, it was a torture. He had strong prejudice and would make fun of u if u had low marks in tests. A lot of little quizzes and they are very hard. Very difficult to get a good grade if he doesn't like you. Poor teaching quality too.

I warn u guys!! Never ever take any course with this guy.He is awfully disorganized.He only makes fun of u and prejudges u.Never ask any question cuz it's useless!You'll never get to an answer simply because he doesn't even know it himself.The most boring class I've ever had.
He gives very discouraging comments, and he expects a lot from exams.
The worst teacher I have ever had. He simply can not teach. He should not be teaching. He discouraged me to further take any ling. classes.
He IS the worst prof I've ever had!! No more to say.. Just don't take this course with this guy!! Seriously this course was a nightmare cuz of him~!!

Horrible horrible teacher. Can't teach, not engaging, poor organization, etc. On top of that he is unfriendly, intolerant, and appears prejudice.  Picked poor text for the course which he admitted to be dense and dull. Do not take this course w/ him.
exam is so hard

This professor is the worst professor that I have ever met!!  He is not helpful, he play favourites, and when you do bad on an exam he makes a face AND THEN hand you the exam!  He made me lose my interest in Ling. and give up on getting my TESL cert.

He's profession in linguistic, but he's not a good professor. He's lazy. He announced to give us back the assignments since the beginning of class, but he'd never do it. He didn't give us hints about what'd the exams be. He confused me and my friends.
I personally hate phonetics, but he made it fun and INTERESTING damn it.  He actually had intriguing lectures and didn't just regurgitate the text.  If you want what the text says, just READ IT.
No Comments
No Comments
excellent liguist, but poor prof
No Comments
Great prof. Hard course, but he teaches it very well and he makes it fun.
very knowledgeable but doesn't prepare too much
Good prof, fun lectures.
I suggest don't take his class unless it is necessary
